import React from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import products from '../products'; const ProductScreen = () => { const params = useParams(); console.log(params); const product = products.find(p => p._id === params.id ) return <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} } export default ProductScreen
